Name: Sheep in Dreams
About the game: Sheep in Dreams is a Roguelike RPG developed by Cham Project, published by OTAKU Plan. STORY One day, mysterious sheep began to appear in Hitsuji-chan's house! And strange things happen around everyone in the city... When you dream, you can enter the dream dungeon. Let's capture the dream dungeon and solve the mysterious phenomenon! Find the keys and doors dropped somewhere on the map and move on! Every weapon has its own unique skill! Use these skills to defeat EPIC bosses FEATURE Action game Roguelike Map exploring
Meta Title: Sheep in Dreams: Dec 9, 2022, Cham Project and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Sheep in Dreams? Check out the release date (Dec 9, 2022), developer insights from Cham Project, and a complete game summary.
